priority_order: tier_1 articles should be scraped first (highest priority)
tier_2 articles provide important context and analysis
potential_issues: Washington Post and New York Times articles may be paywalled
Some URLs may require JavaScript rendering
Video content in some articles may not be captured by text scraper
ABC News story IDs may change over time
recommended_approach: Test each URL for accessibility before batch processing
Use appropriate user agent to avoid blocking
Consider using archive.org fallback for inaccessible articles
Extract metadata: publication date, author, section

expected_sources: Major news outlets will publish analysis
monitoring_strategy: Set up alerts for 'Epstein files December 19'
